text: Does Julia have something that gives Unicode categories like <https://www.compart.com/en/unicode/category/Ll> ?

elements.text: Does Julia have something that gives Unicode categories like

text:
```julia> Base.Unicode.category_string('a')
"Letter, lowercase"```
Also check the other `Unicode.category_*` functions
Thanks. I believe that is not in the documentation. I also searched for the Unicode functions in the Unicode section, but they were mostly in the Strings section.

elements.text: Thanks. I believe that is not in the documentation. I also searched for the Unicode functions in the Unicode section, but they were mostly in the Strings section.

text: The reverse method probably doesn’t exist? I.e. list all lowercase letters.
